testCaseName: Click Forgot Password and Verify Error
name: Click Forgot Password and Verify Error

statusDetails.message: BUG: Forgot Password link berhasil diklik tetapi halaman menampilkan error 'The requested item has not been found'. URL: https://projectsoftware-testing.sg1.glpi-network.cloud/front/lostpassword.php?lostpassword=1. Expected: Redirect ke lostpassword.php page dengan form reset password. Actual: Error page dengan message 'The requested item has not been found'. ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>
